title: Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website built with React and hosted using GitHub Pages.

title: Santorini
description: Server-client implementation of the table game "Santorini" from CranioCreations SNC

title: Social-network-data-management
description: Data structure to store entities and relationships between them, built with time and memory constraints

title: iniscrapec
description: Web scraper for the website "inipec.gov.it" that from an Italian VAT code returns the PEC (certified email address) of a company.

title: Working-Zone Encoding
description: Hardware component designed to implements the Working Zone Encoding (WZE) which reduces the energy used in microprocessor address buses.

title: Jnk
description: Web application for the validation of aerial images of locations at risk for the presence of illegal landfills, with a crowdsourcing approach.
